settings.sub-faq-text: How does the Larkspur Referral Program work?
settings.sub-Faq-des: When you refer a friend to Larkspur Baby Company, they'll receive $25 off their first purchase of $80 or more. After their order ships, you’ll earn 5,000 points. You can redeem these points for $25 off your next purchase.

settings.sub-faq-text: How do I refer a friend?
settings.sub-Faq-des: Simply share your unique referral link with your friend. When they make a qualifying purchase of $80 or more, they’ll receive $25 off, and you’ll earn 5,000 points after their order ships.

settings.sub-faq-text: When will I receive my points?
settings.sub-Faq-des: Your 5,000 points will be credited to your account after your friend's order has shipped.
Yes, you can refer as many friends as you’d like! Each successful referral will earn you 5,000 points, which you can redeem for $25 off your next purchase.

settings.sub-faq-text: Is there a limit to how many points I can earn?
settings.sub-Faq-des: Nope! The more friends you refer, the more points you can accumulate. Keep sharing the Larkspur love!

settings.sub-faq-text: Can I combine my referral discount with other promotions?
settings.sub-Faq-des: Your friend’s $25 off referral discount can be combined with other promotions, as long as their order totals $80 or more before discounts are applied.

settings.sub-faq-text: What happens if my friend returns their order?
settings.sub-Faq-des: If your friend returns their order, you won’t receive the 5,000 points. The referral reward is only issued if the purchase is completed and the order isn’t returned.

settings.sub-faq-text: Can I use my points on any purchase?
settings.sub-Faq-des: Yes! Once you’ve earned 5,000 points, you can redeem them for $25 off any future purchase at Larkspur Baby.
Points earned through the referral program do not expire, so you can save them for as long as you like.

settings.sub-faq-text: What happens if someone misuses the referral program?
settings.sub-Faq-des: Larkspur Baby's referral program is designed to reward genuine referrals. Any fraudulent activity, including self-referrals, creating multiple accounts, or sharing referral codes on coupon sites, is strictly prohibited. If misuse is detected, we reserve the right to cancel referral rewards and suspend accounts involved.
